name: snooker online
description:
Snooker is the most popular billiard game, also the most complex and challenging one.
Players hit the object ball with red ball,color ball alternately in every switching club.If there is still red ball on the desktop, put the color ball back in place after hit it into the ball pocket. Only when all the red balls are in the ball pocket, can those color balls which are in the ball pocket stay where they are. If the white ball falls into the bag, the other side wins a free ball.
Hit the Red ball into the pocket to get a point. There are six colored balls, two points for the yellow ball, three for the green, four for the brown, five for the blue, six for the pink and seven for the black.
If one hits the ball when he should hit the red ball, he loses points, and vice versa. Finally, the winner must win with the highest integral points.
